reviews.review:
Не рекомендую :DDD, но игра хороша...
[h1] Достоинства [/h1] 
...Пугающая атмосфера с обоих сторон, красивые локации, интересные маньяки.
...Большая система прокачки, обретения навыков, система выдачи плюшек.
...Игровая механика генераторов, палеток.

[h1] Недостатки [/h1] 
[b] Очень сложно играть новичку, старички душат ヽ(>_<ヽ) ―⊂|=0ヘ(^‿^ )  [/b]
It is very fun game,but the game is too dark.
veruy guod guod is veruy fiun
recent update is bad, still fun overall very competitive

This one is tricky, on one hand, I really like the aspect of hunting down survivors or evading a bloodthirsty killer, but on the other, I despise SWF's and facecampers.(although there are those who deserve it).

米共一样的匹配机制，尼玛我一个14/15段的小屠夫把把排紫段车队，特别是晚上，仗着段位高疯狂嘲讽，各种蹲起12,晃手电，不管哪个服都是这样，好不容易上11段了，红段车队又来了，新手屠夫根本没办法快速拿到目前版本的必备的几个技能，控场能力基本为零，还对地形不熟悉，基本上只有被溜5台机的下场，运气好抓一个，就这一个还会被人语音沟通来轮流扛刀给救下来，跑门口卡bug蹲起看你屠夫刀空气，出门给你发gg，同段位人跑了我技不如人，但高7、8个段位你骄傲尼玛呢，户口本上只有一页吗这么喜欢嘲讽新手？气的我昨晚巴布守了一晚上的尸，现在掉回15段了才好受了些，这匹配对新手太劝退了，我宁愿多排会也不愿意跨级打，再不改改这游戏很快就没新人入坑了
Dope game to play with friends and others. Highly recommend.

its actually really good, i usually dont like horror games but this one is actually really good, its not too expensive and if your too scared to be a survivor just be the killer, i really reccomend thid game to everyone
fun with friends and by yourself.
very nice game to play with friends

O jogo é divertido inicialmente,ele da sensação de medo,muitos killers licenciados,jogar com os amigos,um grande acervo de perks (habilidades),vários sobreviventes,muitos mapas etc.Porém,com o passar do tempo percebemos muitas coisas,como a hitbox falha,perks desbalanceadas,killers desbalanceados,comunidade tóxica (até streamers descaradamentes tóxicos)e uma empresa que não ouve os jogadores (estou sentindo que eles estão mudando,veremos mais para frente).Recomendo esse jogo,mas não tenham a expectativa de jogarem por um longo prazo.Tentem variar tudo,perks,skins,amigos com quem você joga e joguem de sobrevivente e de killer,assim enjoarão de uma forma mais lenta.

This game is not for me. You have no real means of fighting back as a survivor, and that's not fun to me. If you like horror movies, you may like this game, but I despise horror movies and games like this.
I mean it's dbd what do you want me to say.
Me he divertido mucho, lo unico malo es que algunas veces tarda mucho en buscar una partida u.u
一年前我还是一个小萌新，现在我已经是一个140h的小萌新了(=ﾟДﾟ=)
A good, fun game, especially if you have friends to play it with.

I was been waiting for 20-30 minutes to play "The Mastermind" and its tooks so longs but im still confused that i cant playing the killers, i was returned to back in lobby menu and clicked the survivor and i was readying to playing but its already started as least in 1 minutes. 

Hey Dev, lets me playing killer in less one seconds in test building, its makes no sense thats im playing survivor less in above one seconds. FIX YOUR GAMES!
有大佬知道游戏为什么一直进不去么

great value for the price. Get it if you enjoy high intensity chases and/or horror themes. I also love the strategy aspect of the game. Although there is a lot of dlc, there's no real need to buy, since you can get the perks possibly for free alternatively. Overall, I would recommend Dead By Daylight.

killer chase survivor, you would think a concept that straight-forward would be easy to develop but they somehow managed to include more bugs than any game I've ever seen but still fun game i do recommend

Fantastic online multiplayer game for both solo and with friends! I have had this game for years, I play it on and off but I always come back to it. The devs put in a lot of work, and the game keeps consistently getting better. I would highly recommend this and many of the dlc's!
16年就关注的游戏，后来不能看直播了，但是还是买了玩，这游戏是真的可以的
its just like hide and go seek
Love it, I have it on switch too

I've been playing this game for years and each time I do, it almost always allows me to have fun. I've been playing with my siblings who are new to the game and they have fun with it too. I play this on Xbox and easily have over 200 hours on it (I didn't play it for about a year and a half.)

Bullshit game, after 900 hours of in game experience I can say it is not worth it. Developers just cant fix matchmaking. I am constantly facing red ranks despite i am much lower.. Not mentioning in game bugs Like I cant pick survivor from the ground, or I lag in mid of a generator-pull action. Only thing that is nice are killer ideas, but matchmaking and bugs just killing the game. Not worth to buy.
listen to your fans and fix the game
Arkadasiniz varsa dunyanın en zevkli oyunu. Arkadasiniz yoksa iskence gibi.

재밌다. 왜 이제야 샀지? 안 해본 사람들 있음 빨리 사
나도 고수들처럼 잘 도망 다녀 보고 싶다
this game is spoopy so if you like getting chased around by a murderer you should get dead by daylight

Depois da ultima atualizaçao, o jogo foi de bom para horrivel, grafico e interface ficaram horrorosos, parece que to jogando num samsung galaxy pocket 7, o jogo era muito bom e divertido, com um unico problema de ser mal otimizado, mas para resolver este problema, cagaram oque estava bom, a unica coisa que peço, voltem o jogo como era antes

玩人：sb队友毁体验，不修机傻蹲着，怂得像第一次玩，挂到死没人理，这发生在红段
玩屠：红段车队等着你，速修快到你掉下巴，杀死两人才保段，不打针对来减员，四跑门边嘲讽你，结算聊天框打ez，顿时想删这游戏，尼玛我刚到绿段，为什么这样对待我

内心：什么时候我当屠夫可以排到sb人类出出气
Что можно сказать об этой игре? Ничего.
ive been playing for three year on xbox
I would only play this game with friends. The developer team is not good at incorporating community feedback.
un juego muy desequilibrado, el killer tiene mas ventajas que los survis y mas campers que en un cod
Baggzyy is actually cracked at this game. Recommend!
la verdad es una basura , pero es como la coca sabes que te daña pero te chingas otra solo digo que la comunidad da asco
good game, best thing is i sometimes I  let 1 survivor free, best feeling ever

tailored for survivors, if you don't play killer with the most meta perks at red ranks you're a killer in a wheel chair, if the survivors have any brains and aren't all console they can easily play as if they have communication, and if they do have communication you have no chance, god forbid they have a key and just leave.
Если придрочиться, то очень даже хорошо

One of my favorite games. While it definitely has it's ups & downs, it is a game I've found myself coming back to on and off since 2019. 
If I could change anything, I really wish there was cross progression. I've logged 2000+ hours into my PS4 copy and it's pretty disappointing that I have to start from scratch on this PC account. :/
This game is really fun with friends, but playing killer alone can be just as fun. The ranking system is a constant work in progress it seems, but it's understandable because I'm sure it's hard to find a happy medium between decent queue times and good matchmaking.
The characters are incredible. The maps are beautiful and diverse as well, especially the ones they're redoing.
Esse jogo é extremamente desbalanceado e survivor sided porque a BHVR ouve o mimimi dos mains surv lixoso.
Классная игра, которой на данное время нет альтернатив.

BOLO SIMPLES
INGREDIENTES
2 xícaras (chá) de açúcar
3 xícaras (chá) de farinha de trigo
4 colheres (sopa) de margarina
3 ovos
1 e 1/2 xícara (chá) de leite
1 colher (sopa) bem cheia de fermento em pó

INFORMAÇÕES ADICIONAIS
Esse bolo simples é uma daquelas receitas básicas e deliciosas: ele pode ser incrementado com calda de chocolate, recheio de brigadeiro, doce de leite e outras delícias.

No TudoGostoso, você encontra muitas receitas de bolo simples incríveis, como bolo de milho verde da espiga, bolo de cenoura, bolo pão de ló tradicional, bolo fofo de chocolate, bolo de caneca e diversas outras.

E lembre-se sempre de seguir todas as etapas direitinho! O segredo do sucesso de uma boa receita são os ingredientes e o modo de preparo correto. Por isso, sempre use alimentos de boa qualidade e preste muito atenção durante os processo. Assim, você garante um bolo simples fofinho e cheio de sabor!

E essa receita de bolo simples pode ficar ainda mais gostosa se preparada na hora do café! Principalmente se você gosta de acompanhar a sua fatia de bolo com essa bebida deliciosa.

Probably the best cat-and-mouse style game out there, definitely worth the 10 dollars, the community can be a bit toxic at times, so I recommend not reading or interacting with the end-game chat at all if you want to avoid that, but other than that, great game.
This game has a lot of bugs, but when you play killer you feel strong and good when we knock a survivor down
